comments: This contract is a multi-year contract. This contract was awarded to a supplier from prequalified supplier list in accordance with the terms of the Supply Arrangement.  This contract includes one or more amendments.  This contract was competitively source.  For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department. Contract option period exercised.
